channel.title: Umineko FM: Turn of the Golden Witch - Game Over - Wolves Win
channel.description:
![Turn of the Golden Witch|493x500, 75%](upload://gE6IYcZED4YEkz51KFU1p3KT6tB.jpeg) ## Umineko FM: Turn of the Golden Witch - designed and hosted by @astand, cohosted by @Wazza . Reviewer is @DatBird . ## Rules: * Follow all [Global Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) and [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) * Make at least 20 game-related posts each day (unless day ends early). If you fail to meet this requirement, you might get replaced. For 0 posting in full game day I will force replace you without any questions. * Don't edit posts. This includes quickediting for typos, just don't do it. * No alt accounts are allowed. ## General information: * Closed setup. * Days are 48 hours, nights are 24 hours. * Eliminations are majority + plurality. In case of a tie, elimination will be randed. * At EoD, votes made up to :59 mark will be accepted (but not at :00 mark). * It will not be announced if the game reaches MYLO/LYLO * The game will contain bastard elements. However, OP will never lie, your rolecard will never lie, and no flips will ever be false. * [color=4CFF00]**Town**[/color] is uninformed majority and [color=B34500]**Wolves**[/color] are informed minority. * [color=4CFF00]**Town**[/color] win condition is: *Eliminate Wolves and all other possible threats to Town.* * [color=B34500]**Wolf**[/color] win condition is: *Achieve parity with Town and eliminate all other possible threats to Wolves.* * Other win conditions may or may not exist. ## Game mechanics: * There are no conversions. * There may or may not be lost wolves. * Flavor/role claims are allowed **at your own risk**. * Flavor isn't alignment indicative, but might be role indicative for some roles while being misleading or not role indicative for others. * [color=B34500]**Wolf**[/color] factional kill is assigned. Performing it doesn't prevent using other night actions. * You can't perform actions on N0 unless specified otherwise. * Deadline for submitting actions is one hour before the end of the phase (whether day or night). * If you have several different night (day) abilities, then you can use all of them during a single night (day), unless specified otherwise.
## Example rolecard (this role is guaranteed to be present in the game):
[details="Belphegor"] ![Vanilla Town|1004x1077](upload://wIBbpYauJpGRwEernClzfO8MMVV.jpeg) [/details]
## Backups: 1. ArcticXI 2. Marshal 3. Mistyx 4. TrustworthyLiberal 5. Whysper ## Theatergoers: 1. Amelia 2. Arete 3. Conduit 4. DatBird 5. Jane 6. KyoDaz 7. thepigeonnyc 8. Twil1ight
